devdoc.details: Extends SavingsPool functionality with yield generation via external vault      Members maintain individual principal balances and earn proportional yield

AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

EnforcedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is paused.

ExpectedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is not paused.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

balances(address).details: Alias for getBalance for compatibility with SavingsPool interface

returns._0: Balance including principal and earned yield

closePool().details: Only creator can close. Members can still withdraw their balances.

constructor.details: Prevents the implementation contract from being initialized

deposit(uint256).details: For ERC20: Member must have approved the contract to spend tokens before calling      For native token: amount parameter is ignored, msg.value is used      Tokens are deposited into yield vault and member receives vault shares

params.amount: Amount of ERC20 tokens to deposit (ignored for native token pools)

returns._0: Balance including principal and earned yield
Balance including principal and earned yield
Total pool yield (total value - total principal)

initialize(address,address,string,addres.details: This replaces the constructor for cloned instances

params._backendManager: Address of the backend manager (can invite members)
params._circleId: Address of the Lens.xyz circle contract
params._creator: Address of the user creating the pool
params._isNativeToken: Whether this pool uses native token (cBTC) or ERC20 token
params._receiptToken: Address of the receipt token (xshCUSD or xshCBTC)
params._tokenAddress: Address of the ERC20 token to use for savings (zero address if native)

inviteMember(address).details: Creator or backend manager can add members directly

params.member: Address of the member to add

returns._0: True if target is set and reached, false otherwise

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

withdraw(uint256).details: For cBTC (native token): Only returns principal (yield is virtual for demo)      For CUSD (ERC20): Returns principal + actual yield

devdoc.title: YieldSavingsPool

backendManager().notice: Address of the backend manager (can invite members)

balances(address).notice: Gets a member's current balance including yield

circleId().notice: Address of the Lens.xyz circle contract

closePool().notice: Closes the pool, preventing further deposits

createdAt().notice: Timestamp when pool was created (for virtual yield calculation)

creator().notice: Address of the user who created this pool

deposit(uint256).notice: Allows a member to deposit funds into savings and earn yield

getAPY().notice: Gets the APY of the connected yield vault

getBalance(address).notice: Gets a member's current balance including yield

getBalanceWithYield(address).notice: Gets a member's balance including yield

getContractBalance().notice: Gets the contract's current balance (should be minimal, funds are in vault)

getMemberCount().notice: Gets the total number of members

getProgress().notice: Gets the current progress toward the savings goal

getTotalYield().notice: Gets the total yield earned by the entire pool

getYieldEarned(address).notice: Gets the yield earned by a member

inviteMember(address).notice: Adds a new member to the pool

isActive().notice: Whether the pool is currently active

isGoalReached().notice: Checks if the savings goal has been reached

isMember(address).notice: Mapping to check if an address is a member

isNativeToken().notice: Whether this pool uses native token (cBTC) or ERC20 token

members(uint256).notice: Array of all members in the pool

pause().notice: Pauses the contract in case of emergency

principalBalances(address).notice: Individual principal balances for each member (excluding yield)

receiptToken().notice: Receipt token (xshCUSD or xshCBTC) minted to users on deposit

setTarget(uint256,uint256).notice: Sets or updates the savings goal for the pool

shareBalances(address).notice: Individual vault shares owned by each member

targetAmount().notice: Optional target savings amount set by creator

targetDate().notice: Optional target date for reaching the goal

tokenAddress().notice: Address of the ERC20 token used for savings (zero address if native token)

totalPrincipal().notice: Total principal deposited across all members (excluding yield)

totalSaved().notice: Total amount saved (tracked for compatibility, equals totalPrincipal)

withdraw(uint256).notice: Allows a member to withdraw from their savings balance

yieldVault().notice: Yield vault where deposits are stored

userdoc.notice: Collective savings pool where members earn yield on their deposits
